author: Siobhan Hughes
title: Florida Gov. Rick Scott to Enter Senate Race
text:
WASHINGTON—Florida Gov. Rick Scott announced Monday he would run for the Senate seat held by Democrat Bill Nelson, committing to a contest likely to become one of the most competitive and costly in the nation.
“Our work is not done,” Mr. Scott said in a speech in Orlando with construction firm OCD Construction as a backdrop. Saying he had helped turn the state’s economy around during his two terms in office, Mr. Scott said, “We have to keep looking forward and that’s why today I’m announcing another mission...I have decided...
